question: As per a recent report, start-ups founded in which Indian city is more than in San Francisco, in the past five years?
explanation:
As per the recent report released by Tracxn, a company which tracks investments and financials, the number of start-ups founded in Bengaluru has been higher than in San Francisco, United States in the past five years.
In 2015, 3,080 firms were founded in the Indian city, as against 2,040 companies in San Francisco. Similarly, in 2020, 805 firms were founded in Bengaluru, whereas the US cityâ€™s count was 619. Bengaluru has around 13,000 active start-ups, at present.
